title: Biggest Regrets, Trump Tweets, Sand and Soul, Best Sport and more.
itunes:title: Biggest Regrets, Trump Tweets, Sand and Soul, Best Sport and more.
description:
Welcome to the ride.  We are here to empower, enlighten and entertain you as always.  Today we see what each crew members biggest regrets are.  Trump badmouths John Legend, Chrissy Teigen and more on Twitter.   Junior makes some predictions based on 45's actions.  Uncle Steve has a huge deal for you to capitalize on for Sand and Soul.  Whole Foods is being accused of indoctrinating children.  If the crew could be the best at a sport, what would it be?  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about trials, tribulations and trusting the process, plus much more.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
